logic

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RoomInterface, java.io.Serializable

    public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
implements RoomInterface, java.io.Serializable
    The Room class will be the basis for every room in the game showing what objects are stored in a room and what doors the room has.
    Author:
    lewismcewan, laudernich1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
